propertyDescriptor.name: SSRSServerURL
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the baseURL to the server used to run SSRS reports. It is expected to be something like: 'http://myServer.org/Reports/Pages/ReportViewer.aspx?'

propertyDescriptor.name: SSRSReportFolder
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the subfolder within SSRS that holds the SSRS reports
